item.title: #016 : The Jazz Program Drifts By The Window: The September 2023 Radio Programming Calendar
item.description: Hey y’all! As the vast majority of you know, I’ve been the host of The Jazz Program on datafruits.fm for a good couple years now, and the host of a small show called Talkie Time on the timeslot before it. I’ve decided to make a monthly post here to let you fine folks know which records we’re going to be playing each episode, as well as take a bit to talk about some of my favorite jazz and jazz-related artists and records.

item.title: #002: Why Love Jazz? About The Jazz Program and Our February 2023 Programming
item.description: You might not like it, but this is what peak UI design looks like. Hey y’all! As the vast majority of you know, I’ve been the host of The Jazz Program on datafruits.fm for a good couple years now, and the host of a small show called Talkie Time on the timeslot before it. Since finally deleting my Twitter account, however, I’ve had a bit of an issue.
